channel.title: assert on Vincent Demeester
channel.description: Recent content in assert on Vincent Demeester

item.title: Golang testing — gotest.tools assertions
item.description: Table of Contents Assert and Check More assert helpers cmp.Comparison Equality with Equal and DeepEqual Errors with Error, ErrorContains and ErrorType Bonus with Panics Miscellaneous with Contains, Len and Nil Write your own Comparison Conclusion… Assert and Check Both those functions accept a Comparison (we’ll check what it is later on) and fail the test when that comparison fails. The one difference is that Assert will end the test execution at immediately whereas Check will fail the test and proceed with the rest of the test case.
